description:
To save a lost village in the Far North of Siberia, Mariska and Vassilissa embark on a road trip. They will come across myths and legends rooted in this area. Will you reach your destination without succumbing to the dangers inhabiting these hostile lands?

Choose your destinations

Your journey will lead you through different situations depending on the choices you make. You will meet twenty colorful characters such as Koschei and Baba Yaga. You can visit unexplored places from the map or discover the outcomes of other choices anytime by replaying the game!

Manage your resources during your journey

To progress smoothly in your adventure, you will need to oversee your gas level and amount of money. You can collect these resources at different steps during your trip. Your truck’s condition matters too: without your Firebird, it’s the end of the line!

Discover Slavic legends

Encounter legendary figures all over the map and admire them as you progress. This universe, hand-drawn by Quentin Vijoux and written by FibreTigre (Out There, Game of Rôles), unleashes the enchantment of Slavic culture.
name: Firebird
intro: Firebird is a narrative road trip inspired by Slavic folklore. Aboard your truck, travel to the far north, meet colorful characters, and face the creatures inhabiting these sacred lands.
